duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides nursing services as directed by the RN.
Administers medications, treatments, etc. as directed.
Communicates effectively with RNCM, DCS, and physicians (as applicable).
Gathers clinical data and provides to RN via documentation and communication in order to support comprehensive assessment and plan of care management.
Provides education and reinforcement of teaching related to care of the patient, disease process, symptom management, medications, wound care, and the dying process.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required. Minimum of one (1) year of full-time experience as an LPN required. Current CPR certification required.
